title: Betting on Sunday’s game? Here’s who you’re up against
description: More than $800 million in Super Bowl bets have already come in through prediction markets. On today’s Big Take podcast: how these markets have changed the sports betting landscape — and how one pro is approaching his bets this weekend (Source: Bloomberg)
content: More than $800 million in Super Bowl bets have already come in through prediction markets. On today’s Big Take podcast: how these markets have changed the sports betting landscape — and how one pro is approaching his bets this weekend (Source: Bloomberg)
